net.co.java.server

Class Server.GameServer.Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.co.java.server.ServerThread
      • net.co.java.server.Server.GameServer.Client
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Enclosing class:
    Server.GameServer

    public class Server.GameServer.Client
extends ServerThread
    The Client is the worker thread for every client listening to the GameServer. It listens for incoming packets and works the queue of outgoing packets. All packets are delegated to their corresponding handler here.
    Author:
    Jan-Willem Gmelig Meyling, Thomas Gmelig Meyling
